mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "name", a.`type` AS "type", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.is_del AS "del"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_dict_type a WHERE a.is_del = ${DEL_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.id
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO sys_dict_type ( id, name, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, is_del ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{del} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dict_type SET is_del = ${DEL_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id}
